original_text: The Lord answered, ‘It is because my people have not accepted the laws that I gave to them. They have not obeyed me. They have not lived in the way that I told them to live.
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시되 이는 그들이 내가 그들의 앞에 세운 나의 율법을 버리고 내 목소리를 순종하지 아니하며 그대로 행하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: It is because my people have not accepted the laws
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내 백성이 법을 받아들이지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They have not lived in the way
that I told them to live
